nodes.text: A male machinery dealer lived on the planet of Nolar in 39 BBY. When Quermian Dr. Murk Lundi attempted to purchase a Nolarian 6000 drill from him, the dealer informed him that he did not have any due to a shortage. When Dr. Lundi continued to insist on it, the dealer repeated that he did not know when he would get more in because of how closely the mining safety committee was watching the situation. Enraged, the Quermian yelled at the dealer, calling him a "pathetic weakling" and causing the dealer to freeze and stare at the doctor as he left the shop.
This machinery dealer appeared without being named in the 2002 young readers novel Jedi Apprentice Special Edition: The Followers, written by Jude Watson.
